confirm_delete.title: Are you sure want to delete this data?
confirm_delete.message: Deleted record can not be recycled!
confirm_delete.message_neighborhood: This neighborhood has sub-neighborhoods assigned to it, by deleting this neighborhood, those sub-neighborhoods will be reassigned by the system and will have to be manually corrected. Are you sure you want to delete this neighborhood?
